title: Witchcraft
body:
Now this is something I might be into. 1. The spirit hates it a lot! 2. A old popular book series a read when I was a kid featured witchcraft & wizardry, it was amazing.
    Of course, this isn't a book. It still sort of has the fantasy of one though. I actually want to get into this, I could ride around on a broom stick! Quidditch would be awesome!
    I'm going to get into this, but then of course, the spirit has to be constantly screaming at me!
